description: Official NFL season
Game week number
Abbreviation of team
`REG` for regular season, `POST` for postseason
Abbreviation of opponent team
The number of completed passes.
The number of pass attempts as defined by the NFL.
Yards gained on pass plays.
The number of passing touchdowns.
Number of passing interceptions
Number of sacks taken as a QB
Yards lost from sacks suffered by this team
The number of sacks suffered with a fumble.
The number of sacks suffered with a lost fumble.
Passing air yards (includes incomplete passes).
Yards after the catch gained on plays in which player was the passer (this is an unofficial stat and may differ slightly between different sources).
First downs on pass attempts.

Total expected points added on pass attempts and sacks. NOTE: this uses the variable `qb_epa`, which gives QB credit for EPA for up to the point where a receiver lost a fumble after a completed catch and makes EPA work more like passing yards on plays with fumbles.
Completion percentage over expected for this team.
Two-point conversion passes.
The number of official rush attempts (incl. scrambles and kneel downs). Rushes after a lateral reception don't count as carry.
Yards gained when rushing with the ball (incl. scrambles and kneel downs). Also includes yards gained after obtaining a lateral on a play that started with a rushing attempt.
The number of rushing touchdowns (incl. scrambles). Also includes touchdowns after obtaining a lateral on a play that started with a rushing attempt.
The number of rushes with a fumble.
The number of rushes with a lost fumble.
First downs on rush attempts (incl. scrambles).
Expected points added on rush attempts (incl. scrambles and kneel downs).
Two-point conversion rushes
The number of pass receptions. Lateral receptions officially don't count as reception.
The number of pass plays where the player was the targeted receiver.
Yards gained after a pass reception. Includes yards gained after receiving a lateral on a play that started as a pass play.
The number of touchdowns following a pass reception. Also includes touchdowns after receiving a lateral on a play that started as a pass play.
The number of fumbles after a pass reception.
The number of fumbles lost after a pass reception.
Receiving air yards (incl. incomplete passes).
Yards after the catch gained on plays in which player was receiver (this is an unofficial stat and may differ slightly between different sources).
Total number of first downs gained on receptions
Total EPA on plays where this receiver was targeted
Two-point conversion receptions
Total number of kick/punt return touchdowns
Total number of solo tackles for this team
Number of tackles this team had with an assisted tackle
Number of assisted tackles for this team
Number of tackles for loss (TFL) for this team
Yards lost from TFLs involving this team
Number of times a fumble was forced by this team
Number of sacks by this team
Yards lost from sacks forced by this team
Number of QB hits by this team (should not include plays where the QB was sacked)
Number of interceptions forced by this team
yards gained/lost on interception returns by this team
Number of passes defended/broken up by this team
Number of defensive touchdowns scored by this team
Number of fumbles forced by this team
Number of safeties forced by this team
Miscellaneous yards attributed to this team
Number of the player's own team fumbles recovered
Yards gained/lost on own fumble recoveries
Number of the opponent's fumbles recovered
Yardage on opponent fumble recoveries
Fumbles recovered and advanced for a touchdown
Number of penalties attributed to this team
Penalty yardage on penalties attributed to this team
Number of timeouts used by this team
Count of punt returns by this team
Yards gained on punts returned by this team
Count of kick returns by this team
Yards gained on kick returns by this team
Count of field goals made by this team
Count of field goals attempted by this team
Count of field goals missed by this team
Count of field goals attempted by this team that were blocked
Longest successful field goal made by this team
Percentage of field goals successfully made
Count of field goals within 0-19 yards made by this team
Count of field goals within 20-29 yards made by this team
Count of field goals within 30-39 yards made by this team
Count of field goals within 40-49 yards made by this team
Count of field goals within 50-59 yards made by this team
Count of field goals over 60 yards made by this team
Count of field goals missed between 0-19 yards by this team
Count of field goals missed between 20-29 yards by this team
Count of field goals missed between 30-39 yards by this team
Count of field goals missed between 40-49 yards by this team
Count of field goals missed between 50-59 yards by this team
Count of field goals missed over 60 yards by this team
Comma-separated string listing lengths of field goals made
Comma-separated string listing lengths of field goals missed
Comma-separated string listing lengths of field goals blocked
Total distance on field goals made
Total distance on field goals missed
Total distance on field goals blocked
Count of extra point kicks made
Count of extra point kicks attempted
Count of extra point kicks missed
Count of extra point kicks blocked
Percentage of extra point kicks successfully completed
Count of game winning field goals made
Count of game winning field goals attempted
Count of game winning field goals missed
Count of game winning field goals blocked
Total distance on game winning field goals completed
